title: I3S Scene Layer: attributeStorageInfo
description: An object that describes the structure of the binary attribute data resource of a node.

items.description: Declares the headers of the binary attribute data.

enum-description.attributeByteCounts: Should only be present when working with string data types.

items.description: Declares the ordering indicating the order in which the array of attribute byte counts and the array of attribute values are stored in the binary attribute data.

attributeValues.description: Represents the description for value encoding. For example: scalar or vector encoding.

attributeByteCounts.description: Represents the description for value encoding. For example: scalar or vector encoding.

objectIds.description: Stores the object-id values of each feature within the node.
